violations.finding: Multiple instances of direct python3 calls without explicit venv activation in code blocks. Lines 19-32 show python3 being called after source activation in some places but inconsistent pattern.
violations.recommendation: Standardize all python3 invocations to use explicit venv activation before each call

violations.finding: Multiple direct python3 calls without consistent venv activation patterns
violations.recommendation: Add explicit venv activation before all python3 invocations

violations.finding: Contains inline JavaScript/MCP tool execution code (not marked as examples) showing actual API calls with parameters
violations.recommendation: Move to scripts/ directory or mark explicitly as 'Example:' section

violations.finding: Contains inline JavaScript code for driving_route API calls without example marker
violations.recommendation: Move to scripts/ or clearly mark as example section

violations.finding: Contains inline JavaScript code blocks showing actual API calls (distance_measure, weather_info) without clear example marker or implementation context
violations.recommendation: Mark as 'Example:' or move to skills documentation if these are reference examples

violations.finding: Direct python3 call without proper venv activation: 'source venv/bin/activate || source .venv/bin/activate && python3 ...' - fallback pattern may cause command to execute outside venv
violations.recommendation: Use explicit absolute path to venv python: '/root/.claude/venv/bin/python' or ensure venv is fully activated

violations.finding: Uses decimal step numbering (Step 11.5, Step 15.5, Step 15.6) instead of sequential integers
violations.recommendation: Renumber to use integers only (Step 11, Step 12, Step 13, etc. or revise step structure)

violations.finding: Unresolved merge conflict or severe duplication: 'Step 0: Initialize Workflow' block is repeated 10+ times consecutively. Lines 276-395 contain malformed section with repeated content, indicating failed merge or corruption
violations.recommendation: Resolve merge conflict and remove markers. Verify file integrity.

violations.finding: Lines 87, 110, 118 use direct python3 calls without explicit venv context. While venv is sourced at lines 70-78, the inline python3 invocations in subshells or conditional contexts may execute outside venv.
violations.recommendation: Use full path to venv python: '${PROJECT_ROOT}/venv/bin/python' or re-activate venv before each python invocation

violations.finding: Hardcoded GitHub repository name 'travel-planner' and username 'Yugoge' without parameter support
violations.recommendation: Accept as CLI arguments: MAIN_REPO_NAME="${1:-travel-planner}" MAIN_REPO_USER="${2:-Yugoge}"

summary.scope: All active scripts (non-archive files) - archive directory excluded per user request
